dymiumCore for developers

Source: vignettes/for-developers.Rmd
for-developers.Rmd
library(dymiumCore)
#> ── * dymium's options * ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> ● dymium.input_dir:
#>   /var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmppshIkx/scenario/inputs
#> ● dymium.output_dir:
#>   /var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmppshIkx/scenario/outputs
#> ● dymium.scenario_dir:
#>   /var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmppshIkx/scenario
#> ● dymium.simulation_clock: 0
#> ● dymium.simulation_scale: 1

Main requirements

dymiumCore relies on a number of R packages under the hood such as R6 and data.table. Hence, if you are looking to extend dymiumCore or develop new modules that are compatible a good understanding of those mentioned packages is the one of main requirements.
